title: Episode 6 - Marc Lichtenfeld and Andrew Horowitz give their favorite stock picks for 2010
itunes:title: Marc Lichtenfeld and Andrew Horowitz give their favorite stock picks for 2010
description: Frank discusses biotech and healthcare with analyst Marc Lichtenfeld from the Oxford Club. Also, Andrew Horowitz from The Disciplined Investor breaks down the economy and what stocks have the most upside potential in the first few months of 2010.
content:encoded: Frank discusses biotech and healthcare with analyst Marc Lichtenfeld from the Oxford Club. Also, Andrew Horowitz from The Disciplined Investor breaks down the economy and what stocks have the most upside potential in the first few months of 2010.
